attributes.action: Restore our Constitution with the Act of Settlement and Bill of Rights 1688/9,.
attributes.additional_details: To be made available to those best equipped to understand our British Law.
attributes.background: The key legal issues are resolved in correspondence between the Government's Constitution Committee and John Bingley, who for more than twenty years has dedicated his time on establishing the evidence and truth on these matters..

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for specific action from the UK Parliament and Government.
